name: Wellfell
description:
Summary:

Boney-Wan Kenobi needs to rescue his girlfriend, Bona Lisa from the bottom of a well. Take a trip down the well for wishing and slip, slide and swerve around the badass bats, the surreptitious skeleton hands, and the grimiest of all the goos!

See if you can rescue and impress little Miss Bona by getting down in one piece.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48 Jam. The theme was "Deeper and deeper". 

Good luck!

Features:

  • Multiple endings
  • Full controller support
  • A jolly good ol' time tibia honest

Controls:

  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • Spacebar, Enter to select
  • Backspace, Esc to go back

Credits:

Joep 'Whirlguy' de Jong: Music & Sfx (@Whirlguy) 

Kyle 'Kylazaur' Charles: Code & Design (@Kylazaur)

Jesse J. Jones: Art & Animation (@JesseJayJones)

~~~
